Title: Future Card Buddyfight
Description:
['An adaptation of the Future Card Buddyfight card game.', '
', '
', '
', '
Future Card Buddyfight takes place in a more futuristic version of today. The card game connects to a parallel universe through special cards (Buddy Rare Cards) that act as portals. They bring monsters to Earth in order for them to become buddies with humans. Through friendship and courage, they take on and fight challenges, known as Buddyfights, where people of all ages have friendly non-hurtful competitions. The main character, Gaou Mikado has just started Buddyfighting. As the story progresses, Buddyfights are seeming to become a little too real...']
Related: ['Adaptation: Mayonaka no Occult Koumuin', 'Other: Mayonaka no Occult Koumuin: Fukurokouji to Ano Ko to Ore to', 'Sequel: Mayonaka no Occult Koumuin: Hitoribocchi no Kyuuketsuki']
Characters: ['Mikado, Gaou', 'Drumbunker Dragon', 'Ryuuenji, Tasuku', 'Kurodake, Tetsuya', 'Aragami, Rouga', 'Gaen, Kyouya', 'Hyouryuu, Kiri', 'Demon Lord Asumodai', 'Jackknife Dragon', 'Kisaragi, Zanya']
Voices: ['Mizuno, Marie', 'Oohata, Shintarou', 'Saitou, Souma', 'Yamamoto, Kazutomi', 'Hirota, Minoru', 'Hino, Satoshi', 'Terakawa, Aimi', 'Ota, Tetsuji', 'Yasumoto, Hiroki', 'Saiga, Mitsuki']
Staff: [['Ikeda, Shigetaka', 'Director'], ['Ebina, Yasunori', 'Sound Director'], ['Takahashi, Hideya', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Nakajuu, Shunsuke', 'Episode Director']]
